verses.1: Mawhna in migilo paʼ lungsim tawng ah thu gen a, amah in Pasian zahtakna nei het lo hi.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh ama mawhna kidawk khia lo a, muhdahna thuak lo ahih manin amah kimawk phat tawm hi.
verses.3: Ama kammalte pen siatna le khemna vive hi a, pil gamtatna le hoih gamtatna bei khinta hi.
verses.4: A lupna tungah lumin siat gamtat ding a ngaihsun hi. Hoih lohna lamah amah kibulh tawm a, amah in siatna nolh lo hi.
verses.5: Topa aw, na itna kip in vantung ban a, na cihtakna in vanpi dong ban to hi.
verses.6: Na thumanna pen Pasianʼ mualte tawh kibang a, na thukhennate pen tuipi thuk tawh kibang hi. Mihing le ganhing na hon hi, Topa aw.
verses.7: Pasian aw, na itna kip manpha mahmah hi. Mihing tate na kha liim ah bu uh hi.
verses.8: Na inn sunga na tampite tawh amaute nuamsa uh a, na hoihna gun panin amaute na dawnsak hi.
verses.9: Bang hang hiam cih leh nuntakna tuinak nangmah tawh om a, na khuavak sungah kote in khuavak ka mu uh hi.
verses.10: Nang hong theite tungah na itna kip hong zom inla, lungsim thutangte tungah na hotkhiatna hong zom in!
verses.11: A kihisak mite kei hong su khasak kei inla, migilote, hong hawl khiasak kei in.
verses.12: Hua lai ah siatna bawlte a cimawhin kun uh a, amaute kisuncip sukin, tho zo nawn lo uh hi.
